title: Asasse Pa Vegan Restaurant - temporarily closed
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Western, Juice bar, Ghanaian
description: Vegan restaurant featuring a mix of international and traditional Ghanaian dishes. Also serves fresh juices and other drinks. Part of the Asasse Pa Health Resort. Open-air dining area on the beachfront. Temporarily closed for renovations as of Sept 2015. Please update HappyCow of changes.
